summary: Sarina is a proactive strategy and operations management professional with an impressive track record of delivering support and creating work streams that enable the delivery of optimal results, high customer and client satisfaction, and strong business growth. She is focused on developing business operations including managing cross-functional teams, supporting executive leadership, launching success initiatives, and building vision and clarity in program development. She is a strong strategic operations professional with a passion of working on teams creating products that make the lives of individuals easier!
headline: Senior Director of AI Deployment & Success @ Assort Health - Specialty-specific voice AI to answer patient calls

educations.activities: Sikh Student Association, Mentorship at UCLA, Volunteer at UCLA Ronald Reagan Medical Center

position.title: Senior Director of AI Deployment & Success

multiLocaleTitle.en_US: Senior Director of AI Deployment & Success

position.description:
Developing the first generative AI call center built for healthcare. Join us!

Unlock 24/7 patient access with multilingual generative voice AI that answers patient phone calls. 9M+ interactions helping save employees times and improve access.

Trusted by thousands of providers at healthcare organizations: Palm Beach Orthopedics Institute, OrthoIndy, SharedPractices, Peninsula Orthopedics Associates, MDCS Dermatology, Cleaver Medical Group, Northern California Retina Vitreous Associates, Catalyst Medical Group, Chesapeake Healthcare OrthoIndy, Pediatric Associates of Southwest Missouri, and many more.

Backed by top institutional funds like Quiet Capital and leaders from Commure, Flatiron, AthenaHealth, Infinitus, and PathAI.

position.title: Operations @ Next Legacy Partners
position.description: Next Legacy is on a mission to amplify the impact of our diverse community of philanthropists, athletes, cultural luminaries, venture capitalists, and founders through outsized venture capital returns. Visit nextlegacy.com for more information!

position.title: Chief of Staff
position.description:
- Support CEO and CMO with various company objectives
- Work cross functionally with each department head
- Work directly with clients (onboarding and implementation)
- Support VP of Operations on all client deliverables and continued client relationships
- Manage 5 clients individually (weekly syncs, client decks, reporting, state expansion/growth)
- Help foster company culture with monthly team building events
- Support the hiring manager with hiring and hiring needs/projections
- Work with clinical team to identify any gaps and define provider success
- Work on optimization, operational best practices, workflow efficiency, and metric driven problem solving 
- Led executive team meetings and managed CEO’s schedule
- Work on multiple projects simultaneously with various stakeholders within the executive team

position.title: Vice President Operations
position.description:
- Directly reported to and supported the COO
- Directly managed Customer Success, Provider Success, and Recruiting teams
- Helped define and build out Operations team and OKRs
- Developed SOPs for both the Clinical team and Business Operations team
- Worked cross functionally with executive team members supporting OKRs
- Worked directly with Pharmacy partners and helped own deliverables 
- Owned multiple cross team projects working with various stakeholders
- Staff Development 
- Managed New Verticals
-Oversaw revenue projections for Operations team

position.title: Manager, Business Operations and Strategy
position.description:
- Responsible for various cross-functional projects to support care delivery as the company continued to rapidly scale
- Worked directly with Senior Living Facilities to bring our doctors to their residents to provider primary care services
- Tasked with a variety of operational and strategic priorities including process improvements and operationalized workflows
- Serve as a true partner to executive leadership across the board including providing recommendations and guidance 
-  Created and owned Escalation process for internal teams to conduct a root cause analysis and document follow-up and improvements process
- Operational Process Improvements for the Clinical teams and overall business function
- Project Management: Managed multiple cross functional projects internally and with the onsite teams at the Senior Living communities 
- Strategic planning for future expansion and future hiring
- Strategic operations for day to day needs and support for Care Team providing direct care to our patients 
- Creation of internal Operational workflows
- Role eliminated due to organizational restructure

position.title: Clinical Operations Manager
position.description:
- Support Director of Operations with day to day clinical operations including customer support inquiries, Therapist and Physician network growth, and process implementation.
- Worked closely with C-Suite (CEO, CTO, and CMO) to develop clinical operations, define metrics, and implement workflows 
- Analysis of consumer and patient trends
- Implementation of Therapy program services and continued improvements 
- Operationalized streamlined workflow processes for Therapist network growth
- Recruitment, Onboarding, and Implementation into new markets
- Understand various markets and strategizing network growth
- Training and education materials built out for new employees
- Directly Managed Customer Support Manager

position.title: Enterprise Operations Manager (One Medical @ Google)
position.description:
- Support local office employees; administrative and clinical
- Manage day-to-day local and district operations to ensure high quality patient experience
- Adapt, analyze data and provide solutions in a fast paced work environment during a time of strong growth
- Focus on the development and quality of virtual operations
- Design and manage key operational drivers, including hiring, workflow, resource, and performance management
- facilitate and design training structures
- Assist in an operational re-design of the district admin role and district structure

position.title: Specialty Care Project Manager
position.description:
- Supported the launch of the Pediatrics program and helped train team members in different markets. 
- Operationalized workflows and process improvements through patient and employee feedback
- Project managed the Dermatology Clinic and helped create better work streams 
- Created trainings and disseminated across teams
- Provided direct patient and provider support
